name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
purpose: Provide loans to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises.
eligibility: Any Indian citizen with a business plan for a non-farm sector income-generating activity.

name: Stand Up India Scheme
purpose: Facilitate bank loans between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 crore to SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.
eligibility: SC/ST or woman entrepreneur above 18 years of age.

name: National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship Scheme (NMMSS)
purpose: Provide scholarships to meritorious students of economically weaker sections.
eligibility: Students of class IX with parental income less than ₹1.5 lakh per annum.

name: KALIA Scheme (Odisha)
purpose: Financial assistance to small and marginal farmers.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers of Odisha.

name: Telangana Dalit Bandhu Scheme
purpose: Support Dalit families through direct cash transfer.
eligibility: Dalit families selected under the scheme.
